rawDictionary.alert.download.tainted-first-line: Manual save by right click the card
rawDictionary.alert.explaination.tainted.first-answer: You are using an image host that lacks the necessary "approval" needed for the app to use it. Browsers see it as a potential security risk (even if it is not the case), and mark the card as "tainted".
rawDictionary.alert.explaination.tainted.second-answer: A "tainted card" prevents all sort of automatic save. From then on you must save the card manually by right click it → "Save image as...". It is implying that this action is fully of your consent.
rawDictionary.alert.explaination.tainted.third-answer:
Change to other safe and popular image host ("imgur" for example) will likely fix the issue. You may try to refresh the page if the issue persists.
If you cannot afford to switch to other image hosts, the app will also work mostly just fine, you only need to manually save the card (and keep cautious for potential malicious links).

rawDictionary.contributor.disclaimer.label: Disclaimer
rawDictionary.contributor.disclaimer.line-1: This is a personal project, not an "official" card maker. I do not have any affiliations with any other card makers, be it website, desktop app or mobile app. And {siteLink} is the only site that is directly maintained by me.
rawDictionary.contributor.disclaimer.line-2: The code of my site is provided as-is. I hold no liability for any other parties that may use or modify the code of my app on their own sites.
rawDictionary.contributor.disclaimer.line-3: I hold no liability for cards created by this app, including pictures, card text and any product related to it.
rawDictionary.contributor.disclaimer.line-4: I do not own any of Yu-Gi-Oh card layers and fonts use in this project. They belong to their respective creators.
rawDictionary.contributor.disclaimer.line-5: If you want to modify card layers, or use it in any public project, please contact {author1} or {author2} directly.
rawDictionary.contributor.disclaimer.line-6: This app is completely free to use, I do not charge any kind of fee, require donation or serve any ads in this site.

rawDictionary.guide.format.label: Formatting Help
rawDictionary.guide.format.section-1.content:
Wrap a line of text in {openTag} and {closeTag} to prevent the text from breaking down into multiple lines.
If hotkeys are allowed, you can select the desired text and press {hotkey} or {hotkeyAlternative}.
rawDictionary.guide.format.section-1.label: Non-breakable line
rawDictionary.guide.format.section-2.content:
Wrap a piece of text in {openTag} and {closeTag} to prevent the text from breaking down into multiple lines.
If hotkeys are allowed, you can select the desired text and press {hotkey} or {hotkeyAlternative}.
rawDictionary.guide.format.section-2.label: Non-breakable text
rawDictionary.guide.format.section-3.content:
Put a {separator} in between of a non-breakable text to annotate the text with small letters above it.
If hotkeys are allowed, you can select the desired text and press {hotkey} or {hotkeyAlternative}.
rawDictionary.guide.format.section-3.label: Ruby
rawDictionary.guide.format.section-4.content:
Put a {separator} in between of a non-breakable text to annotate it with compressable small letters that does not try to extend beyond the text below it.
If hotkeys are allowed, you can select the desired text and press {hotkey} or {hotkeyAlternative}.
rawDictionary.guide.format.section-4.label: Compressable Ruby
rawDictionary.guide.format.section-5.content:
Wrap a piece of text in {openTag} and {closeTag} to prevent the text from being compressed.
If hotkeys are allowed, you can select the desired text and press {hotkey} or {hotkeyAlternative}.
rawDictionary.guide.format.section-5.label: Non-breakable text
